Legal_Issue: Whether the press release constitutes a reviewable decision under the Federal Courts Act
Governing_Law: Sections 18 and 18.1 of the Federal Courts Act
Application_Facts: The press release announced the Inquiry Committeeâ€™s composition and did not constitute a decision with legal effect; the applicant raised premature concerns about the inquiry's scope
Decision_Outcome: The judicial review application was struck
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of the Canadian Judicial Council's press release
Claimant_Status: Justice Michel Girouard, directly affected party
Defendant_Behavior: Issuance of a press release regarding the inquiry into Justice Girouard's conduct
Grounds_for_Claim: Perceived bias or procedural unfairness in the formation of the Inquiry Committee
Legal_Standard: Application must disclose a reasonable cause of action and target a decision with legal effect
Assessment_Factor: Nature and legal effect of the press release
Procedural_Issue: Prematurity of the application and lack of justiciable decision
Application_Basis: Allegation that the press release prejudiced the fairness of the upcoming inquiry
Relief_Sought: Set aside or nullify the press release through judicial review
Governing_Rule: Only actual decisions with legal effect are subject to judicial review
Evidentiary_Deficiency: No evidence of an actual decision with legal consequences
Outcome: Application dismissed as unnecessary and premature
Harm_Assessment: No demonstrated legal harm from the press release
Cause_Description: Justice Michel Girouard challenged the Canadian Judicial Council's press release regarding an inquiry into his conduct
Evidence_Handling: Court examined the press release for legal effect
Evidence_Issues: Press release lacked legal effect and did not constitute formal decision
Jurisdictional_Issue: Whether the court has jurisdiction over a non-decision such as a press release
Evidence_Assessment: Press release is informational, not adjudicative or binding
Decision_Rationale: The press release did not constitute a decision with legal effect; application was premature
Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of concrete evidence of legal impact from the press release
Legal_Standard_Applied: Test for a reasonable cause of action and existence of a reviewable decision
